greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Index sequence of the Thue-Morse sequence (A010060, using offset 1) as a reverse block-fractal sequence.
comment: See A280511 for definitions. Note that the records, 3,12,48,192,... are also records in A280510, if A010060 is indexed with offset 1 instead of 0; see Example.
example: (init. bl. #1) = (0); reversal = (0), first occurs s(1), so that a(1) = 1;
(init. bl. #2) = (0,1); reversal = (1,0) first occurs at s(3), so that a(2) = 3;
(init. bl. #3) = (0,1,1); reversal = (1,1,0) first occurs s(2), so that a(3) = 2.
mathematica: breverse[seq] (* A280512 *) (* _Peter J. C. Moses_, Jan 01 2017 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Feb 10 2017
